channel.name: Athena ADT Watcher
channel.description:
Watches Athena instance for new/updated patient records.
When it sees one it pushes the patient ID into the queue for the channel which then triggers an event in the destination.
http://help.interfaceware.com/v6/athena-adt-watcher

from_mapper.commit_comment: JULIAN WAS HERE all removed - this is the release version
